DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate rofecoxib in the treatment of rectal, colon, or duodenal adenomas in patients with Familial Adenomatous Polyposis.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Rofecoxib in Familial Adenomatous Polyposis (FAP)
DOC.criteria: Males or females at least 18 years of age with familial adenomatous polyposis.
